name: Man's Best Friend (uberBuilder24)
description:
Man's Best Friend is a game where you play as a person and a dog, and the goal of the game is to get through the level without either you or the dog dying.

This game fits the theme because you can switch between the person and the dog.

The yellow circle around the dog is the circle you need to be in if you want to regenerate health or walk faster.

This game is still pretty buggy, however, if the game gets a lot of support, I will keep working on the game after the jam results are released.

The Theme

This game fits the theme because you can switch between the person and the dog.

Controls

WASD - Player Movement

Mouse Movement - Aim (Disabled for Dog)

Left Click - Fire (Disabled for Dog)

Q - Switch Characters

Tab - Point to the Other Character
